meta.title: BCH Gifts  | Bitcoin.com
meta.description: Create trackable cash gifts in your local currency with Bitcoin Cash (BCH)

header.title: Bitcoin.com Gifts
header.description: Create and manage Bitcoin Cash (BCH) Gifts. Unredeemed Gifts are automatically returned!

strings.seedReminderAbove: Save this 12-word seed to access your gifts in the future
strings.seedReminderBelow: Bitcoin.com never has access to your seed and we cannot help you if you lose it!
strings.seedWarning: Bitcoin.com never has access to your seed and we cannot help you if you lose it!
strings.inputExtra: If no refund address is provided, unclaimed tips will be donated to Bitcoin.com to help promote peer to peer electronic cash.
strings.sweepInstructions: You can send all the BCH from your unclaimed gifts to a single address in one transaction.

labels.tipAmountFiat: Fiat amount (per gift) in your selected currency

notifications.giftsSwept: {tipsSweptCount} of original {tipWalletsCount} gifts have been swept to {userRefundAddress}

placeholders.tipAmountFiat: Enter the fiat currency value desired for each gift
placeholders.userRefundAddress: All swept gifts will be returned to this address.
placeholders.userRefundAddressOnCreate: Unclaimed gifts return to this address

alerts.giftDidNotPost: Gift information failed to post to backend. Your gifts will not be automatically returned to you on expiration.
alerts.reclaim: Error creating your reclaim transactions. Your gifts will not be automatically returned to you on expiration.
alerts.apiErrorWarningAlpha: Failed to post your gift expiration claim transactions to the server.
alerts.apiErrorWarningBeta: Your gifts will not automatically be returned to your refund address after their expiration date!
alerts.apiErrorWarningGamma: Make sure to save your 12-word backup seed above. You can still access your gifts with this phrase.
alerts.apiErrorWarningDelta: Please try to repost your gift information. If the issue persists, contact tips-support@bitcoin.com
alerts.txErrorWarningAlpha: API error while creating your auto-reclaim transactions.
alerts.txErrorWarningBeta: Your gifts will not be automatically returned on their expiration date!
alerts.txErrorWarningGamma: Make sure you have written down your 12-word backup seed.
alerts.txErrorWarningDelta: Please try again with the button below. If the issue persists, contact tips-support@bitcoin.com

errors.tipCountNoTips: Gift count must be greater than zero
errors.tipCountNotInteger: Gift count must be an integer
errors.tipCountNum: Gift count must be a number
errors.fiatTipAmountNum: Gift amount in local currency must be a number
errors.fiatTipAmountRequired: Desired gift in local currency is required
errors.noMnemonic: To import a mnemonic, you must enter a 12-word seed
errors.noTipsAtMnemonic: No gifts found for this mnemonic
errors.invalidUserMnemonic: Must match 12-word seed created in previous step
errors.invoiceGenerationError: Invoice server unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.invalidRefundAddress: Invalid refund address. Please enter a valid BCH address.
errors.youreTooCheap: Error: Value of gift is too low. Gifts must be at least 0.0005 BCH. Increase your fiat amount per gift.
errors.tipCountTooManyTips: Gift creation is currently limited to 20.
errors.networkError: Network error, the API at rest.bitcoin.com did not respond.
errors.invalidExpirationDate: Expiration date cannot be more than 1 year in the future.
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address (or none at all)
errors.expirationMustBeFuture: Expiration date must be more than one hour from now.
errors.priceApiError: Error obtaining BCH price in selected currency from price API.
errors.cannotSweep: Error: Cannot sweep tips, all gifts have already been claimed!
